official_title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to change the composition of the northern and central districts of Illinois.

summary.text: Amends the federal judicial code to change the composition of the Northern and Central Districts of Illinois. Removes Whiteside County from the Western Division of the Northern District and places it in the Central District.

titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to change the composition of the northern and central districts of Illinois.
